name: The Fallen Leaves
description:
Information

A small project made by me, GhostglowDev and OrangeLeaf36
This project is made by a new dev. Do not expect
much from me

Progress [27.6%]

Doing: Making maps, actor (player) and enemies

Extra: This project is currently being updated. Stay tuned on the next update! Changelogs 0.8.3 New Features

- Added chromatic aberration
- Added loading screen
- Added easeOut Tween (by OrangeLeaf36)

- Fixed long loading screen

Enjoy the game and thanks for downlaoding!
